guide.introduction: This is a simple project that can be completed in an afternoon once you've scrounged up all the components.
guide.introduction_rendered: This is a simple project that can be completed in an afternoon once you've scrounged up all the components.

lines.text: Gather your materials. you will need:
lines.text_raw: Gather your materials. you will need:

lines.text: Trucks and wheels from two skateboards
lines.text_raw: Trucks and wheels from two skateboards

lines.text: To make things more comfortable, you will want to have as much padding over the screws as possible. So take whatever you can out of the shoe.
lines.text_raw: To make things more comfortable, you will want to have as much padding over the screws as possible. So take whatever you can out of the shoe.

lines.text: I pulled out the inserts and another layer that was glued down. Be careful pulling this stuff out; you are going to want to put it back in after your trucks are installed.
lines.text_raw: I pulled out the inserts and another layer that was glued down. Be careful pulling this stuff out; you are going to want to put it back in after your trucks are installed.

lines.text: Put masking tape on the soles so that you can mark where you want to drill.
lines.text_raw: Put masking tape on the soles so that you can mark where you want to drill.

lines.text: Place the skateboard trucks on the bottom of the shoe and mark where the holes should go.
lines.text_raw: Place the skateboard trucks on the bottom of the shoe and mark where the holes should go.

lines.text: Make sure the trucks are centered and straight.
lines.text_raw: Make sure the trucks are centered and straight.

lines.text: Use locknuts on all the bolts to keep things from falling off.
lines.text_raw: Use locknuts on all the bolts to keep things from falling off.

lines.text: You may want to add an aluminum plate or some other brace to stiffen the bottom.
lines.text_raw: You may want to add an aluminum plate or some other brace to stiffen the bottom.

lines.text: Put the liners back in the shoes.
lines.text_raw: Put the liners back in the shoes.

lines.text: Enjoy at your local Roller Disco!
lines.text_raw: Enjoy at your local Roller Disco!
